### Petersburg Wellness Consortium
The Petersburg Wellness Consortium raises consciousness about health factors and outcomes by empowering community members, sharing capacity-building resources and creating partnerships that promote a healthy community.
There focus groups include: Chronic Disease, Oral Health, Youth Health

It was launched in Fall 2012 by Dr.Maghboeba Mosavel 

The organization, which is made up of a alliance of stakeholders and WE (academic-community partnership), uses collective resources to try to improve the overall health of Petersburg

### Questions
What factors affect the improvement of healthy outcomes in Petersburg, VA.
